name: Fish Matters
description:
An arcade-style game where big fish eat little fish. It was made in 4 days by a single dude, so you'd better not expect AAA standards.

Control a fish and swim towards other fish. The bigger one will engulf the smaller one and score points.

Reach max score, eat snails, feed on shrimps. You're in the jungle baby, the underseas jungle.

CONTROLS

Move with WASD / Arrow keys

CREDITS

As a proper programmer, I can't art. All sprites and sound used in this game are open licensed. Credit, and my personal thank you, go to the following people:

Wall Sprite: Tiziana

Sky background: KnoblePersona

Surface sprite: Zabin

Underwater background: Robert Brooks

Splash effect: Julien Jorge

Seaweed & Fishing bear: You're Perfect Studio

Jaws effect: carnageddon/Simon

UI Buttons: AllyProductions

Underwater music: Cleyton Kauffman

Bite sound: josepharaoh99

Water splash sound: Churd-Tzu

Fishing bobbles: Nelson Yiap

Fish forage: rapidpunches
